column5:
What do mushrooms and the blockchain have in common? With any luck, more than you might think. Indeed, mycopunk rules! Hear @jeffemmett on imagining mycelial futures, as well as my new favorite band @formidableveg on the new @TeamHumanShow. 
https://t.co/lK91i5o5tj

"Creatives don’t wait for the right moment to be creative, they create the right moment by spending time on their craft." @HalaNAlyan on Medium: 
https://t.co/GBLnWv9L2D
@michaelmhughes That means a whole lot to me, Michael. :)

If you're freaked out about Artificial Intelligence and the replacement of human labor, values, and meaning systems, please take a look at (or listen to) my 2018 book about what was coming and how to respond, Team Human. 

https://t.co/lrj1lBa4GH

I insisted I had not done anything. That it was pure coincidence. An old man put his forehead against my forehead, his nose against my nose, smiled, and said “Coincidence is the skill of a great storyteller.”

https://t.co/OFzsJslhhO
@sdavis2045 I'm not *promoting* anything but critical thinking.

Our kids are more aware of the social cues and memetic layering in digital spaces than we are. Rather  try to insulate them from what we fear about digital culture, we need to retrieve and share with them what we value most about critical thinking.
https://t.co/rzWtqO3rHJ
Culture Journalist is the best. I'm so proud to be on their radar.
and a picture of me 17 years ago...
Shareable's podcast! https://t.co/aXCcnkmwLg
https://t.co/CvZPKKIQoT

Librarians rule. Vermont's @jessamyn  West on libraries, community technology, and why local beats scale. (She also owns Metafilter.)
https://t.co/ooohxDBLmh

Oh shoot. Are we praying to the wrong gods? @MitchHorowitz brings the @TeamHumanShow to some uncertain places...
https://t.co/yRzs0KOn3v

"The fact that a person can be best manipulated by thinking of them in mechanistic and behavioural terms does not mean that they are thereby essentially programmable machines. Behaviorism and materialism are not facts but assumptions."  https://t.co/X34YSrvB2Q

"If the justification for the existence of the über-rich is that we are slowly progressing toward an earthly utopia, then why do so many of these billionaires seem so keen to escape?" New review of Survival of the Richest by @garethsouthwell https://t.co/X34YSrvB2Q

After a month or two of people believing Photoshop and Illustrator made their work look indistinguishable from that of professional designers, we all began to recognize the telltale visual signs of amateurs being led by the software.

https://t.co/Yiwlx1b12U
This.
I'm on @FastPoliticsPod with the fabulous @MollyJongFast talking about Musk, SBF, and the spectacular end of tech bro dominance.

The Twitter debacle shows it is not civil society and government that need tech leadership; it is technology that needs to retrieve the mechanisms of civil society and collective governance.

No paywall link: https://t.co/se24W3m3GS
@justinhendrix Exactly. It's like the story of Exodus. They are trapped in Mitzrayim, the "narrow place."
Is Web3 going just great? Molly White on Team Human, along with a Rushkoff monologue on the year that tech bro lunacy was exposed.  @molly0xFFF @teamhumanshow https://t.co/EwAzKd27mp
Very honored to be interviewed by the great @parismarx about my book Survival of the Richest, and for the opportunity to talk about something other than the provocation introduction!

Effective Altruisms? Stop worrying about treating people nicely or if your business is destroying the planet. As long as you make a ton of money take 5% of your income and give it to charity, you’re doing more good long-term than by being a good person.

https://t.co/GR7Wkc5lrI

I did a really fun podcast with Mayim Bialik, on recalibrating for human connection: 

https://t.co/IY3VS3zBkH

So we are supposed to accelerate toward the next phase of being, one order of magnitude or “complexity” beyond our own. Most regular humans can’t even conceive of it, because it’s just too meta for our one-dimensional brains.

https://t.co/aPoJlzub0x

Finally posted. Survival of the Richest on BookTV with the great @kwerb serving as interlocutor. Just as the tech billionaire mindset was being exposed for all... 
https://t.co/YDpxfO7qPL
https://t.co/0FzpRvR1gO

We don’t do this ‘proof of work’ to accomplish or serve any function other than to prove we have done it. It is quite literally the process through which we convert atoms to bits, reality to its meta-stasizing counterpart. https://t.co/Xmh7LNU9u3

The best holiday gift for anyone hoping to understand the tech billionaire mindset and its current breakdown, told in hilarious yet biting anecdotes of my encounters with these strange men. #elonmusk, #ftx Now available in book, ebook, and audio formats: 
https://t.co/7XV1F4VCZt

Like salvation to a Christian, enlightenment to a Buddhist, or the IPO to a venture capitalist, “going meta” and operating at least one level above the mere mortals down here on terra firma has become the ultimate goal of any self-respecting tech titan.
https://t.co/EKZvdMUh3C

Warner canceled successful, profitable TV shows because the tax write-off made more even money than the shows.  Cory Doctorow @craphound on the new TeamHumanShow
https://t.co/nGwSsVIMhj
